xml.episodeInfo:
FUTURAMA
Episode 505
KIF GETS KNOCKED UP A NOTCH
Bill Odenkirk Dave, The Neutral Planet
xml.info: Opening Credits. Caption: Bigfoot's Choice.
Planet Express: Lounge. Amy flies in on a party-board.
xml.speak: Woohoo! Shman! The Great Rad Spot is mega sweet for mega party-boarding.
Indeed.
Any calls while I was out?
Yeah. You got a telesonic transmission from Kif a couple hours ago.
xml.info: Amy gasps.
xml.speak: My Kiffie called? Kif?
ON SCREEN Ooo Amy you're back. Another hour and I would have thought about hanging up.
Why didn't you just leave a message sweetie?
ON SCREEN Well um, I've left hundreds of messages with your answering machine but you never seem to...
(SHOUTING) Bender!
Not my fault if you don't check me! Messages erased.
ON SCREEN Oh dearest, this long distance relationship is too much to bear......when even an inch seperates us I quiver with misery. So you can imagine how I feel when it's a billion light years.
xml.info: He cries.
Cut to: Nimbus Communication Room.
xml.speak: ON SCREEN Kif, don't cry, or you'll get a tummy ache.
xml.info: Cut to: Planet Express: Lounge. On the screen Zapp walks up behind Kif.
xml.speak: ON SCREEN Lieutenant, some things came off me and clogged the drain so if you could......oh ho! What's this?
xml.info: Cut to: Nimbus Communication Room. Zapp zooms the screen in on Leela.
xml.speak: Well well well! Do my eyes believe me or is that my bosomy swan, Leela?
ON SCREEN Say again. You're breaking up!
xml.info: She throws the book she is reading at the screen.
Cut to: Planet Express: Lounge. Leela's book hits the screen and smashes it, cutting off the line. Amy groans. Enter Farnsworth.
xml.speak: Good news everyone. You'll be delivering pain medicine to the hive mind of Nigel 7.
xml.info: Enter Scruffy, wheeling in a huge pill.
xml.speak: Scruffy's rollin' out a large pill!
You're going to Nigel 7? Kif's on patrol near there! You could drop me off on the way!
We could but we won't! It's a spaceship dammit not a prom limousine! If anyone needs me I'll be in the Angry Dome.
xml.info: He leaves, waving his fists.

Cut to: Outside Planet Express. The ship takes off. Farnsworth paces around and curses in the Angry Dome which is a small transparent structure in the roof between the hangar and Farnsworth's home dome.
Ship's Cockpit. The ship leaves Earth orbit.
xml.speak: This is a very long trip, so we'll all have to go into hibernative-naptosis to save oxygen.
xml.info: She presses a button and the lights dim. Bender curses.
xml.speak: I don't even breathe oxygen!
xml.info: He shuts down.
Ship's Cargo Bay. The crew are asleep. In the darkness of the cargo bay, the giant pill begins to shake. It breaks apart and Amy climbs out of it.
Cut to: Ship's Cockpit. Amy sneaks past a snoring Bender, sits in the pilot's seat and takes control of the ship.
xml.speak: (WHISPERING) Here I come Kif!
xml.info: She turns the ship around and laughs.
Nimbus Bridge. Zapp watches Casper The Friendly Ghost on the screen and chuckles.
xml.speak: They jump right out of their pants! Oh what now? Activate glass window. Kif, I'm sensing a very sensual disturbance in the force. Prepare for ship-to-ship intimacy!
Yes sir captain!
xml.info: Cut to: Outside Nimbus. The front section of the Nimbus's starboard leg opens up and swallows the Planet Express ship � la the SPECTRE spaceship in You Only Live Twice.
Cut to: Leela's Quarters. The lights come on and a startled Leela wakes up. She turns over and sees Zapp lying beside her.
xml.speak: How 'bout I help you finish that dream you were having about me?
OK, I was just at this part: Heyya!
xml.info: She punches him and he falls off the bed.
xml.speak: Uh, let's try that a little lower and a lot softer!
xml.info: Kif's Quarters. Kif and Amy sit on his bed.
xml.speak: Imagine you stowing away and stealing a licenced starship! Oh it's so romantic it gives me the shivvers!
xml.info: He shivvers.
xml.speak: I don't care how much trouble I get in. I needed to feel my lips pressed against your lipless beak!
xml.info: They kiss.
xml.speak: Oh Amy, I can't stand having a whole universe between us. I've been thinking a lot about this and, well, would you move in with me?
Here? But...uh...wouldn't it be crowded?
No no, it's really twice the size! You can use the floor and, I'll have the ceiling! See?
xml.info: He climbs up the wall and onto the ceiling. Amy giggles.
xml.speak: Kif! You have so much creativity and niceness, but......I'm not sure if I -
Hush! Before you answer, come thither!
xml.info: Nimbus Holo-Shed. A bare room which looks very similar to the Holodeck from Star Trek: The Next Generation. The walls, floors and ceiling are criss-crossed with lines. Amy looks around.
xml.speak: This is the Holo-Shed. It can simulate anything you desire, and nothing can hurt you. Except when it malfunctions and the holograms become real.
Well, that probably won't happen this time.
I wanted to show you what life would be like if we were together. Computer: Run program Kif-1.
xml.info: The environment changes to a mountainous landscape with a small house in the background. Amy gasps.
xml.speak: This is so beautiful! Spirit! Kif! That's the pony I always wanted but my parents said I had too many ponies already!
Yes. I prgorammed it in for you! 4 million lines of BASIC! And, if this isn't the life you want, how 'bout this? Run program Kif-2!
xml.info: The environment changes to a night-time scene by a moonlit lake.
xml.speak: Oh Kif!
xml.info: They put their arms around each other.
xml.speak: We could live here by the shore of the tranquilibrious sea, in a timeshare. And I would pluck the moon from the sky, just to see you smile. Almost got it. It seems to be sort of, stuck! I love you! Run program Kif://3.
xml.info: The environment changes to a castle in the clouds.
xml.speak: This isn't bad. My aunt had a place like this.
Amy, we could live in a bus station bathroom for all I care. As long as we're together it will feel like a castle to me.
Kif, I'd love to live with you...someday. But before then there's still lots I wanna do on my own. What was that?
Oh dear. I feel the Holo-Shed might be broken again. Well, as long as we don't cross paths with Atilla the -
xml.info: ...Hun bursts through the castle gates followed by Moriarty from the Sherlock Holmes novels, Jack The Ripper and an evil Abraham Lincoln.
xml.speak: Look! Spirit!
xml.info: Atilla the Hun is riding Spirit, who rears up and roars like a very angry rabid horse.
xml.speak: And there's Professor Moriarty, Jack The Ripper, Evil Lincoln!
xml.info: Evil Lincoln cackles.
xml.speak: Right-o gents it's another simulation gone mad so murder and mayhem, standard procedure!
xml.info: They start wrecking the castle.
xml.speak: Rampage!!
Real hologram simulated Evil Lincoln is back!!
xml.info: He smashes his axe into the castle's wall and the environment fizzles out, leaving Kif, Amy and the holograms in the bare Holo-Shed. Kif and Amy run out.
Nimbus Bridge. Klaxons wail and red lights flash on and off. Enter Amy and Kif.
xml.speak: The Holo-Shed's on the fritz again, the characters turned real!
Damn. The last time that happened I got slapped with three paternity suits. Listen up history's greatest villains......Get back into the Holo-Shed before I start blasting!
Stop! Don't shoot fire stick in space canoe! Cause explosive decompression!
Spare me your space-age technobabble Atilla The Hun!
xml.info: He shoots at the holograms. They dodge the lasers and one shot hits the wall. The bridge starts decompressing. The holograms are blown out into space through the hole. Leela grabs hold of Zapp's chair, Fry grabs her legs and Bender grabs Fry's legs. His chest cabinet opens and an Egyptian artefact falls out. He groans. Zapp flies by and grabs Bender's legs. His toupe� wobbles in the wind. On the other side of the bridge Amy starts losing her grip on Kif's hand.
xml.speak: Kif! Hold on!
I totally want to!
xml.info: His hand slips out of his glove. Amy grabs his face but loses her grip and the wind carries him towards the hole. He grabs hold of Leela.
xml.speak: Grab on!
xml.info: He loses his grip on her and grabs Fry's trouser leg.
xml.speak: Over here!
xml.info: He reaches for Bender but he doesn't help.
xml.speak: Hold me!
Have a good one! Aw, man!
xml.info: Zapp breathes a sigh of relief and straightens his toupe�.
xml.speak: After all that I could use some relaxation. I'll be in the Holo-Shed.
xml.info: Nimbus Sick Bay & Horta Burn Clinic. A doctor finishes examining Zapp.
xml.speak: Well, except for a few broken bones, some internal hemoraging and a partially barfed up heart, everyone appears fine. Oh and Kif is pregnant.
xml.info: Everyone gasps. Kif hugs Amy.
xml.speak: Oh joy!
xml.info: Time Lapse.
xml.speak: Amy, isn't it wonderful? I'm pregnant!
(UNSURE) Yes it's...great. A great miracle.
And not one of those bogus everyday miracles like a sunrise. Aren't you a male?
Yeah what's the deal? Just when I thought I'd figured out you biological creatures, its something else! Lemme at 'im! Come...over...lemme...!
xml.info: Kif shakes.
xml.speak: Look, I'm sure we're all a little unclear on how anyone gets pregnant. So Kif, pray explain. And don't spare the dirty words where appropriate.
Well it's quite simple really. When one of my species experiences deep feelings of love we enter a so called "receptive state."
You disgust me! Go on.
At that point, our skin becomes a semi-permeable membrane which allows the passage of genetic material. I held Amy's hand and voila.
Oh OK. but that better be all there is!
Oh Amy! You'll be a mother!
xml.info: He hugs her.
Kif's Quarters. Everyone except Zapp is there. Even Evil Lincoln.
xml.speak: What a wonderous affirmation of our love! And all from the touch of your hand.
xml.info: He laughs and rolls around.
xml.speak: Dude hold up! Remember when Zapp blew a hole in the ship?
Indeed.
Kif touched everybody there. Couldn't any one of us be the mother?
Hey yeah! I mean...what about that Kif?
Well I suppose I might have gotten pregnant that way. Or even from a toilet seat. Though that's impossible since I have a private washroom.
xml.info: Kif's toilet flushes and Zapp emerges from the washroom.
xml.speak: Ah, my home away from home. By the way Kif, your flush seemed to be set on stun, not kill.
xml.info: Kif trembles.
xml.speak: Look Kif, I probably am the mother. Although maybe I'm not. Of course I hope I am but just in case I'm not, maybe we should have a test.
A test. I demand a test!
xml.info: Planet Express: Hangar. A huge piece of equipment is in the middle of the room. Everyone stands around it.
xml.speak: Even I laughed at me when I built this alien cross species genetic analyser but I guess I showed myself! Subjects, please enter the chamber. Now to take a DNA sample. When I pull this switch the maternifuge will spin at 10,000 RPM, seperating out everyone who isn't the mother....father...whatever.
xml.info: He pulls the switch and the maternifuge starts spinning. Everyone in it screams. Farnsworth drops the floor from underneath them.
xml.speak: Faster! Faster!
xml.info: Fry flies out of the maternifuge and hits a mattress.
xml.speak: Good. Fry's ejection indicates that he is not the man-mom. Nor is Captain Brannigan.
xml.info: Kif wipes his forehead.
xml.speak: Oh thank you merciful God!
xml.info: Zoidberg flies out.
xml.speak: Zoidberg?! What the hell were you doing in there?
That's where I live. I have no home.
xml.info: Everyone watches as Leela and Amy spin around in the maternifuge. Someone screams as they fly through the tube. It is Amy. Kif looks in horror.
xml.speak: Amy? But that means...
xml.info: He looks in the slowing maternifuge. Leela is the only one left. She slides out.
Planet Express: Meeting Room.
xml.speak: Leela must have impregnated me when she grabbed my ungloved hand. That explains the poster in hygiene class: No Glove, No Love.
Wow, this is all so confusing.
Leela! How could you? Our love has had to endure your constant hatred and now this? (crying) Stop testing our love!
Please captain. I thank Leela for the DNA she gave me but in my species, the true parent is the one that inspired the initial feeling of love. We call that person the smizmar. And my smizmar is Amy.
So the toilet seat is like the uncle or something?
xml.info: O'Zorgnax's Pub. Amy and Leela are out for drinks.
xml.speak: Sorry I got your boyfriend pregnant.

That's OK, at least Kif's baby shower should be fun. I'd better put it on my calendar. (to calendar) Thursday: Baby shower. Enter. Might as well plan for my new life while I'm at it. (to calendar) Set Motherhood Mode.
xml.info: The calendar erases all of Amy's entries and replaces it with Motherhood. Amy sighs. Leela raises her glass.
xml.speak: To motherhood.
xml.info: The clink their glasses and guzzle back their drinks.
Robot Arms Apartments: Fry and Bender's Apartment. Everyone has gathered for Kif's baby shower. Leo and Inez Wong are there too.
xml.speak: Mom, Dad, I know this is weird but -
Yeah yeah, we don't care how squishy alien get pregnant. All we care is we have grandchild now.
You're very open-minded Mrs Wong.
Hey! You call her grandma now!
Call me grandma like crazy! All the time!
xml.info: Fry taps his glass.
xml.speak: Check it out y'all. Everyone we invited is here.
Also Zoidberg!
So lets open the gifts!
xml.info: Everyone cheers.
xml.speak: Lets start with this one. From Bender.
xml.info: He opens the box and sees the gift. It is a pair of mounted robot shoes.
xml.speak: It's my booties from when I was a kid.
Uh, they're already bronzed.
They are bronze.
xml.info: Kif is about to open another gift.
xml.speak: And this one's from Leela, oh I just love the bow! I wonder what it is!
xml.info: He starts to open it. Zapp puts his arm around Leela.
xml.speak: Yes I wonder what we got you.
xml.info: Leela elbows him in the stomach. Kif takes the present out of the box.
xml.speak: It's a basket! F-for picnics?
It means a lot to me. It's the basket my parents left me in at the Orphanarium.
You could use it for picnics.
Here Amy. We get this one for you.
xml.info: Amy is excited.
xml.speak: Is it a party board?
xml.info: She opens it.
xml.speak: It's a board alright! An ironing board!
We had your old party board converted now that you not be partying anymore.
You, you trashed my party board?
Damn right! Now you're a mom, the only surfing you do is under a big wave of responsibilty.
Oh this is the happiest moment of my life! You all brought such wonderful gifts! But the greatest gift...
Mine!

...is the bond I share with my smizmar Amy. And soon, the quivvering mass of life within me will depend on us both. Even now I can sense it feeding, squirming, searching, questing and shortly, it will wren my loins into way and pull us down, down, down into the deep dark waters of commitment.
That's so beautiful!
xml.info: He dries his tears with a mouth flap.
xml.speak: (CRYING) Yes, yes it's......no! I can't do this!
xml.info: She runs out of the room crying. Everyone gasps.
xml.speak: Oh my God!
xml.info: Zoidberg cries like a baby.
Time Lapse. Mr and Mrs Wong and Zapp have left.
xml.speak: Oh how could Amy leave me? When will women learn to take responsibilty for the children they've helped create? The quickening! My time is near. I must return to my homeworld to perform the ancient birthing rites.
Lemme know how that turns out.
xml.info: He munches a biscuit.
Amphibios 9 Jungle. The Planet Express ship lands in a jungle area and snaps through some vines. New ones quickly grow again, covering the ship.
Time Lapse. The crew, Kif and Zapp walk through the jungle. Kif stops.
xml.speak: I must now embark on a perilous journey. To give birth in precisely the same swamp I was born.
If it's so dangerous I'd better go with you. A gal has to protect her DNA.
No Leela. Tradition demands that I make this journey with my smizmar, and since Amy isn't here I must go it alone. Farewell. For we may never meet again.
xml.info: He walks towards the thick of the jungle but falls over.
Time Lapse. Fry, Zapp and Bender hack away at plants in front of them while Leela carries Kif.
xml.speak: My scrapes feel a little better now.
xml.info: Bender sees a large blue thing.
xml.speak: Hey, what's this fat ugly thing? A frog? A toad? Or your momma!
xml.info: He laughs. The thing grabs him with it's tongue and starts to swallow him.
xml.speak: It's a poisonous froad! No one move.
xml.info: He inflates his head. The froad screams and drops Bender.
xml.speak: I'm back baby!
xml.info: Kroker Swamp.
xml.speak: Behold. The sacred ancestral birthing grounds of my family.
xml.info: Zapp sniffs.
xml.speak: Smells like a jockstrap.
xml.info: An Amphibion rises from the middle of the swamp.
xml.speak: I am the Grand Midwife.
Hi!
I am Kif of the clan Kroker. I come to bear my young.
Then let the Tea Of New Life be brewed. As it is written "and both shall lift the jug together". Where is your smizmar?
She's not with me.
Oh the sorrow. Oh the shame. I'm sorry I'm probably just making you feel worse.
As long as Amy is with me in my heart I will have the strength of two. Apparently Amy hasn't been working out much lately.
xml.info: He drags it a little way.
xml.speak: As the tea boils please join hands with your beloved smizmar. Oh right sorry, but I memorised the ceremony by heart and it mentions her a lot.
I'll try to endure.
Good 'cause I'm not changing it. Now turn ye to and gaze deeply into each other's eyes.
xml.info: Kif looks at Bender.
xml.speak: What are you looking at?
May the love I sense between you at this moment remain with you both for all your days. The Tea Of New Life is ready. Let those who's love created this life speak each other's names, then drink.
xml.info: Kif looks into the cup and cries.
xml.speak: Amy.
(SHOUTING) Kif!
xml.info: Everyone looks up and gasps. Amy flies towards the swamp on her party/ironing board.
xml.speak: Amy! Is it you or have I gone crazy with lonliness?
Both.
xml.info: Amy lands and falls off.
xml.speak: I still don't know if I'm ready for this but, I do know I love you. And I wanna be here beside you.
Great! Now I lost my place! I'm starting over!
xml.info: Kif's bump rumbles.
xml.speak: Oh no time! It has begun! Oh my!
xml.info: Everyone else cringes at what is happening. Bender pulls out a camera and takes a photo.
xml.speak: Neat!
You can do it Kif!
xml.info: Kif pushes again.
xml.speak: Oh nearly!
xml.info: He pushes some more and eventually some spawn comes from between his legs and makes a huge splash. Leela, Fry and Zapp cover their noses.
xml.speak: Aww man!
xml.info: Some one and two eyed tadpoles hop out from the spawn and head for the swamp.
xml.speak: Amy my love, tell me, are they making it to the water?
xml.info: Some snakes and flying things surround the tadpoles. Leela breaks a huge leaf off a plant and throws it to Amy.
xml.speak: Amy!
xml.info: Amy catches it and starts beating back the animals.
xml.speak: Shoo! Stay away from my babies!
xml.info: A flying thing picks a tadpole up. Amy smacks it with the leaf and the tadpole falls to the ground. The rest of the animals turn around and the tadpoles hop into the water.
xml.speak: The birthing is complete!
xml.info: Everyone cheers and gathers around Kif and Amy.
xml.speak: Oh thank you!
I will now take my leave. I live here so I won't actually be going anywhere but you don't have to talk to me anymore.
Congratulations!
Nice work!
Way to go squishy!
xml.info: The tadpoles swim away.
xml.speak: There goes my DNA. What a disgusting and beautiful process.
That's birth for you.
Well we've given them a great start Amy. And in 20 years they'll sprout legs and crawl back onto land as children.
And I'll be ready then.
xml.info: They hug and watch their children swim around in the swamp. Two leap into the air and bump their heads.
THE END
